thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: After searching on a few sites I found that FlightHub was cheaper by over $150 for the same flights. The booking process was very easy to do, and with very little effort. My only complaint is that they offer flight insurance that is on by default (which I declined). I never buy the insurance that is offered on any site, and wish that if a person wants insurance, that they would select it manually instead of it automatically being added to the bill.
